page.title: 20CLUBS IN CODICOTE/WELWYN
page.content: Welwyn Friendship Mimram Quilters Herts Caravan Club Welwyn Floral Group Crochet Classes Welwyn Wailers Welwyn WI The Ayots WI Welwyn Breakers Herts Gun Dogs Herts Chamber of Association Trade & Commerce Bee Keepers Ladies Circle Weight Guard Welwyn Anglo-French Society Welwyn Film Society The majority of the above Clubs are held in Welwyn Civic Centre, some on a weekly basis, others a monthly meeting. Welwyn Parish Hall is the venue for Weight Guard. In Codicote, Peace Memorial Hall is the venue for a Playgroup, Toddlers Club, Youth Club and Friendly Club. There is also a Local History Society.
